info.title: Twilio Transcription API
info.description: Twilio is a cloud communications Infrastructure as a Service(IaaS) company based in San Francisco, California. Twilio allows software developers to programmatically make and receive phone calls and send and receive text messages using its web service APIs. Twilio's services are accessed over HTTP and are billed based on usage.

delete.description: Deletes a transcription from your account.

parameters.name: mediaTypeExtension
parameters.description: By default, Twilios REST API returns XML. You may obtain CSV, JSON or HTML by appending .csv, .json, or .html.n

get.description: Returns a single Transcription resource representation identified by thengiven {TranscriptionSid}. By default Twilio will respond with the XML metadata for the Transcription. If you append .txt to the end of the Transcription resources URI Twilio will just return you the transcription tex.n

get.description: Returns a set of Transcription resource representations that includes pagingninformation.n
